title: Prepare to edit Angular documentation
contents:
mode_edit

准备编辑 Angular 文档link

Prepare to edit Angular documentationlink

本主题介绍了让本地计算机准备好编辑和提交 Angular 文档的步骤。

This topic describes the steps that prepare your local computer to edit and submit Angular documentation.

IMPORTANT:
To submit changes to the Angular documentation, you must have:

  • A GitHub account
  • A signed Contributor License Agreement

完成贡献者的许可协议link

Complete a contributor's license agreementlink

查看对 Angular 的贡献。这些部分对于文档贡献特别重要：

Review Contributing to Angular. These sections are particularly important for documentation contributions:

  1. 阅读 Angular行为准则

    Read the Angular Code of conduct

  2. 阅读提交指南。

    Read the Submission guidelines.

    NOTE:
    The topics in this section explain these guidelines specifically for documentation contributions.

  3. 阅读并完成适用于你的贡献者许可协议。

    Read and complete the Contributor license agreement that applies to you.

安装所需的软件link

Install the required softwarelink

要在本地计算机上编辑、构建和测试 Angular 文档，你需要以下软件。本节中的说明假定你使用此列表中的软件来完成任务。

To edit, build, and test Angular documentation on your local computer, you need the following software. The instructions in this section assume that you are using the software in this list to complete the tasks.

此列表中的某些软件，例如集成开发环境 (IDE)，可以用类似的软件替换。如果你使用替代 IDE，你可能需要将本节中的说明适应你的 IDE。

Some software in this list, such as the integrated development environment (IDE), can be substituted with similar software. If you use a substitute IDE, you might need to adapt the instructions in this section to your IDE.

有关所需软件的更多信息，请参阅设置本地环境和工作区。

For more information about the required software, see Setting up the local environment and workspace.

  • 版本控制软件

    Version control software

    • Git 命令行

      Git command line

    • GitHub 桌面（可选）

      GitHub desktop (optional)

  • 集成开发环境

    Integrated development environment

    • Visual Studio 代码

      Visual Studio Code

  • 工具软件

    Utility software

    • node.js

      Angular 需要活动的长期支持 (LTS) 或维护 LTS 版本的 Node.js。

      Angular requires an active long-term-support (LTS) or maintenance LTS version of Node.js.

    • 非虚拟机

      nvm

    • 纱线

      Yarn

    • macOS 的Homebrew或 Windows 的Chocolatey

      Homebrew for macOS or Chocolatey for Windows

    • 淡水河谷（见注）

      Vale (see note)

IMPORTANT:
Wait until after you clone your fork of the https://github.com/angular/angular repo to your local computer before you configure Vale settings.

你还可以安装你认为有帮助的其他工具和 IDE 扩展。

You can also install other tools and IDE extensions that you find helpful.

设置你的工作区link

Set up your workspaceslink

Angular 文档与 Angular 框架代码一起存储在 GitHub 源代码存储库（也称为repo ）中，位于： https://github.com/angular/angular 。要向 Angular 贡献文档，你需要：

The Angular documentation is stored with the Angular framework code in a GitHub source code repository, also called a repo, at: https://github.com/angular/angular. To contribute documentation to Angular, you need:

  • GitHub 帐户

    A GitHub account

  • 你个人 GitHub 帐户中 Angular 存储库的fork 。

    A fork of the Angular repo in your personal GitHub account.

    本指南将你的 personal GitHub 帐户称为 Personal 。你必须将 GitHub 引用中的 personal 替换为你的 GitHub 用户名。 URL： https://github.com/personal 不是有效的 GitHub 帐户。为方便起见，本文档使用这些速记引用：

    This guide refers to your personal GitHub account as personal. You must replace personal in a GitHub reference with your GitHub username. The URL: https://github.com/personal is not a valid GitHub account. For convenience, this documentation uses these shorthand references:

    • angular/angular

      指 Angular 存储库。这也称为上游存储库。

      Refers to the Angular repo. This is also known as the upstream repo.

    • personal/angular

      指你的 Angular 存储库的个人 fork。将 personal 替换为你的 GitHub 用户名以标识你的特定存储库。这也称为原始存储库。

      Refers to your personal fork of the Angular repo. Replace personal with your GitHub username to identify your specific repo. This is also known as the origin repo.

  • 在本地计算机上复制你的 personal/angular 存储库

    A clone of your personal/angular repo on your local computer

GitHub 存储库被克隆到你本地计算机上的 git 工作区。使用此工作区和所需的工具，你可以从本地计算机构建、编辑和查看文档。

GitHub repos are cloned into a git workspace on your local computer. With this workspace and required tools, you can build, edit, and review the documentation from your local computer.

当你可以从本地计算机上的工作区构建文档时，你就可以对 Angular 文档进行重大更改。

When you can build the documentation from a workspace on your local computer, you are ready to make major changes to the Angular documentation.

有关如何设置工作区的更详细信息，请参阅为 Angular 文档创建存储库和工作区。

For more detailed information about how to set up your workspace, see Create your repo and workspaces for Angular documentation.

有关如何从本地计算机构建和测试文档的更详细信息，请参阅构建和测试 Angular 文档。

For more detailed information about how to build and test the documentation from your local computer, see Build and test the Angular documentation.

为 Angular 文档创建你的存储库和工作区link

Create your repo and workspace for Angular documentationlink

本节介绍如何创建编辑、测试和提交对 Angular 文档的更改所需的存储库和 git 工作区。

This section describes how to create the repo and the git workspace necessary to edit, test, and submit changes to the Angular documentation.

IMPORTANT:
Because git commands are not beginner friendly, the topics in this section include procedures that should reduce the chance of git mishaps. Fortunately, because you are working in your own account, even if you make a mistake, you can't harm any of the Angular code or documentation.

To follow the procedures in these topics, you must use the repo and directory configuration presented in this topic. The procedures in these topics are designed to work with this configuration.

If you use a different configuration, the procedures in these topics might not work as expected and you could lose some of your changes.

Angular 框架的代码和文档存储在github.com上的 angular 帐户的公共存储库或存储库中。 Angular 存储库的路径是https://github.com/angular/angular ，因此是缩写名称 angular/angular 。

The code and documentation for the Angular framework are stored in a public repository, or repo, on github.com in the angular account. The path to the Angular repo is https://github.com/angular/angular, hence the abbreviated name, angular/angular.

GitHub是一项托管许多帐户和存储库的云服务。你可以想象 GitHub 中的 angular/angular 存储库，如图所示。

GitHub is a cloud service that hosts many accounts and repositories. You can imagine the angular/angular repo in GitHub as shown in this image.

将 angular/angular 存储库 fork 到你的帐户link

Fork the angular/angular repo to your accountlink

作为公共存储库， angular/angular 可供任何人阅读和复制，但不能更改。虽然只有特定帐户有权对 angular/angular 进行更改，但拥有 GitHub 帐户的任何人都可以请求更改它。对 angular/angular 的更改请求称为Pull Request 。一个帐户创建 Pull Request 以请求另一个帐户提取更改。

As a public repo, angular/angular is available for anyone to read and copy, but not to change. While only specific accounts have permission to make changes to angular/angular, anyone with a GitHub account can request a change to it. Change requests to angular/angular are called pull requests. A pull request is created by one account to ask another account to pull in a change.

在打开 Pull Request 之前，你需要个人 GitHub 帐户中的 angular/angular 的 fork 副本。

Before you can open a pull request, you need a forked copy of angular/angular in your personal GitHub account.

要获取 angular/angular 的 fork 副本，你将 angular/angular 存储库 fork 到你的个人 GitHub 帐户中，并最终获得下图所示的存储库。从 personal/angular 的角度来看， angular/angular 是上游存储库， personal/angular 是原始存储库。

To get a forked copy of angular/angular, you fork the angular/angular repo into your personal GitHub account and end up with the repos shown in the following image. From the perspective of personal/angular, angular/angular is the upstream repo and personal/angular is the origin repo.

将 Angular 存储库 fork 到你的帐户link

To fork the angular repo to your accountlink

在浏览器中执行此过程。

Perform this procedure in a browser.

  1. 登录你的GitHub帐户。如果你没有 GitHub 帐户，请在继续之前创建一个新帐户。

    Sign into your GitHub account. If you don't have a GitHub account, create a new account before you continue.

  2. 导航到https://github.com/angular/angular 。

    Navigate to https://github.com/angular/angular.

  3. 在https://github.com/angular/angular中，单击页面右上角附近的Fork按钮。此图片来自https://github.com/angular/angular页面的顶部，并显示了Fork按钮。

    In https://github.com/angular/angular, click the Fork button near the top-right corner of the page. This image is from the top of the https://github.com/angular/angular page and shows the Fork button.

  4. 在创建新 fork中：

    In Create a new fork:

    1. 接受Owner和Repository name中的默认值。

      Accept the default values in Owner and Repository name.

    2. 确认选中了仅复制 main 分支。

      Confirm that Copy the main branch only is checked.

    3. 单击创建存储库。 forking 过程可能需要几分钟。

      Click Create repository. The forking process can take a few minutes.

  5. 你现在在 GitHub 帐户中有了 angular/angular 存储库的副本。

    You now have a copy of the angular/angular repo in your GitHub account.

在你的 angular/angular 的 fork 就绪后，你的浏览器会在你的 GitHub 帐户中打开 fork 存储库的网页。在此图中，请注意该帐户现在显示了你的个人 GitHub 帐户的用户名，而不是 angular 帐户。

After your fork of angular/angular is ready, your browser opens the web page of the forked repo in your GitHub account. In this image, notice that the account now shows the username of your personal GitHub account instead of the angular account.

作为分叉的存储库，你的新存储库会保持对 angular/angular 的引用。在你的帐户中， git 将你的 personal/angular 存储库视为原始存储库，将 angular/angular 视为上游存储库。你可以将其视为：你的更改源自原始存储库，并且你将它们发送到上游的 angular/angular 存储库。你帐户中存储库名称下方的消息（ forked from angular/angular ）包含一个返回上游存储库的链接。

As a forked repo, your new repo maintains a reference to angular/angular. From your account, git considers your personal/angular repo as the origin repo and angular/angular as the upstream repo. You can think of this as: your changes originate in the origin repo and you send them upstream to the angular/angular repo. The message below the repo name in your account, forked from angular/angular, contains a link back to the upstream repo.

这种关系稍后会发挥作用，例如当你更新 personal/angular 存储库以及打开 Pull Request 时。

This relationship comes into play later, such as when you update your personal/angular repo and when you open a pull request.

在本地计算机上创建 git 工作区link

Create a git workspace on your local computerlink

本地计算机上的 git 工作区是云中 GitHub 存储库的副本存储在本地计算机上的地方。要在本地计算机上编辑 Angular 文档，你需要原始存储库的克隆 personal/angular 。

A git workspace on your local computer is where copies of GitHub repos in the cloud are stored on your local computer. To edit Angular documentation on your local computer, you need a clone of your origin repo, personal/angular.

如图所示，将 personal/angular 存储库克隆到你帐户的子目录中。请记住将 personal 替换为你的 GitHub 用户名。工作区中的 personal/angular 目录将成为你的 working 目录。你在 personal/angular 存储库的工作目录中进行编辑。

Clone the personal/angular repo into the subdirectory for your account, as this illustration shows. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username. The personal/angular directory in your workspace becomes your working directory. You do your editing in the working directory of your personal/angular repo.

克隆存储库会复制本地计算机上云中的存储库。有一些过程可以使本地计算机上的克隆与云中的存储库同步，稍后会介绍。

Cloning a repo duplicates the repo that's in the cloud on your local computer. There are procedures to keep the clone on your local computer in sync with the repo in the cloud that are described later.

将 Angular 存储库克隆到你的工作区link

To clone the Angular repo into your workspacelink

在本地计算机上的命令行工具中执行这些步骤。

Perform these steps in a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 导航到 workspace 目录。在此示例中，这是名为 github-projects 的目录。

    Navigate to the workspace directory. In this example, this is the directory named, github-projects.

    如果此目录不在你的本地计算机上，请创建它，然后在继续之前导航到它。

    If this directory isn't on your local computer, create it, and then navigate to it before you continue.

  2. 在工作区目录中，运行此命令以从你的 personal 帐户为存储库创建一个目录，请记住将 personal 替换为你的 GitHub 用户名。

    From the workspace directory, run this command to create a directory for the repo from your personal account Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    mkdir personal

  3. 从工作区目录，运行此命令以将原始 personal/angular 存储库克隆到 personal 帐户目录。请记住将 personal 替换为你的 GitHub 用户名。

    From the workspace directory, run this command to clone the origin personal/angular repo into the personal account directory. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

    git clone https://github.com/personal/angular personal/angular

你的本地计算机现在已配置为如下图所示。

Your local computer is now configured as shown in the following illustration.

你的 working 目录是 git 工作区目录中的 personal/angular 目录。此目录及其子目录包含你为解决文档问题而编辑的文件。

Your working directory is the personal/angular directory in your git workspace directory. This directory and its subdirectories have the files that you edit to fix documentation issues.

完成软件安装link

Complete the software installationlink

在本地计算机上克隆原始存储库后，从命令行工具运行这些命令：

After you clone the origin repo on your local computer, run these commands from a command-line tool:

  1. 安装 Angular 项目使用的 npm 模块。在本地计算机上的命令行工具中：

    Install the npm modules used by the Angular project. In a command line tool on your local computer:

    1. 导航到你的 git 工作区。在此示例中，这是 github-projects 目录。

      Navigate to your git workspace. In this example, this is the github-projects directory.

    2. 在你的 git 工作区中，运行此命令以导航到你的 personal/angular 存储库克隆中的文档根目录。请记住将 personal 替换为你的 GitHub 用户名。

      In your git workspace, run this command to navigate to the documentation root directory in your clone of the personal/angular repo. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

      cd personal/angular

    3. 运行此命令以安装 Angular 依赖项。

      Run this command to install the Angular dependencies.

      yarn install

    4. 运行此命令以导航到文档项目。

      Run this command to navigate to the documentation project.

      cd aio

    5. 运行此命令以安装文档的 npm 模块。

      Run this command to install the npm modules for the documentation.

      yarn setup

  2. 在你的工作目录中定位 angular/aio/tools/doc-linter/vale.ini ，以在下一步中用作Vale:Config设置中配置文件的路径。

    Locate angular/aio/tools/doc-linter/vale.ini in your working directory to use in the next step as the path to the configuration file in the Vale:Config setting.

  3. 安装 Vale以完成软件安装。

    Install Vale to complete the software installation.

构建和测试 Angular 文档link

Build and test the Angular documentationlink

Angular 提供了一些工具来构建和测试文档。要查看你的工作，并在你在 Pull Request 中提交更新之前，请确保使用这些工具构建、测试和验证你的更改。

Angular provides tools to build and test the documentation. To review your work and before you submit your updates in a pull request, be sure to build, test, and verify your changes using these tools.

Note that the instructions found in https://github.com/angular/angular/blob/main/docs/DEVELOPER.md are to build and test the Angular framework and not the Angular documentation.

The procedures on this page build only the Angular documentation. You don't need to build the Angular framework to build the Angular documentation.

导航到 Angular 文档目录link

To navigate to the Angular documentation directorylink

从本地计算机上的命令行工具执行这些步骤。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 导航到本地计算机上 git 工作区中帐户工作目录中的 Angular 文档。

    Navigate to the Angular documentation in the working directory of your account in your git workspace on your local computer.

  2. 导航到你的 git 工作区目录。在此示例中，这是 github-projects 目录。

    Navigate to your git workspace directory. In this example, this is the github-projects directory.

    1. 运行此命令，以导航到使用你 fork 到个人帐户的 angular 存储库的工作目录。请记住将 personal 替换为你的 GitHub 用户名。

      Run this command to navigate to the working directory with the angular repo you forked to your personal account. Remember to replace personal with your GitHub username.

      cd personal/angular

    2. 运行此命令以导航到 Angular 文档目录。

      Run this command to navigate to the Angular documentation directory.

      cd aio

Angular 文档目录是 Angular 文档文件的根。 angular/aio 目录中的这些目录是你找到编辑最多的文件的地方。

The Angular documentation directory is the root of the Angular documentation files. These directories in the angular/aio directory are where you find the files that are edited the most.

Directory 文件Files
angular/aio/content Angular 文档中使用的文件和其他资产Files and other assets used in the Angular documentation
angular/aio/content/guide 大多数 Angular 文档的 Markdown 文件The markdown files for most Angular documentation
angular/aio/content/tutorial 英雄之旅教程使用的 Markdown 文件The markdown files used by the Tour of Heroes tutorial

Angular 文档源在 angular/aio 中有许多其他目录，但它们不会经常更改。

The Angular documentation source has many other directories in angular/aio but they don't change often.

在你的计算机上构建和查看 Angular 文档link

To build and view the Angular documentation on your computerlink

从本地计算机上的命令行工具执行这些步骤。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 构建 Angular 文档。

    Build the Angular documentation.

    1. 从 Angular 文档目录，运行以下命令：

      From the Angular documentation directory, run this command:

      yarn build

    2. 如果构建文档报告了一个或多个错误，请修复错误并在继续之前重复上一步。

      If building the documentation reports one or more errors, fix the errors and repeat the previous step before you continue.

  2. 启动本地文档服务器。

    Start the local documentation server.

    1. 从文档目录中，运行以下命令：

      From the documentation directory, run this command:

      yarn serve-and-sync

    2. 在本地计算机上打开浏览器，并在 https://localhost:4200 上查看你的文档。

      Open a browser on your local computer and view your documentation at https://localhost:4200.

  3. 在浏览器中查看文档。

    Review the documentation in the browser.

在 Angular 文档上运行自动测试link

To run the automated tests on the Angular documentationlink

从本地计算机上的命令行工具执行这些步骤。

Perform these steps from a command-line tool on your local computer.

  1. 如果你还不在那里，请导航到文档目录。

    Navigate to the documentation directory, if you're not already there.

  2. 从文档目录，在测试之前运行此命令以构建文档：

    From the documentation directory, run this command to build the documentation before you test it:

    yarn build

  3. 如果构建文档返回一个或多个错误，请修复这些错误并在继续之前再次构建文档。

    If building the documentation returns one or more errors, fix those and build the documentation again before you continue.

  4. 从文档目录，运行此命令以启动验证文档一致的自动测试。这些是打开 Pull Request 后执行的大多数测试，但不是全部。某些测试只能在自动测试环境中运行。

    From the documentation directory, run this command to start the automated tests that verify the docs are consistent. These are most, but not all, of the tests that are performed after you open your pull request. Some tests can only be run in the automated testing environment.

    yarn e2e

当你对文档更新运行这些测试时，请确保在打开 Pull Request 之前更正任何错误。

When you run these tests on your documentation updates, be sure to correct any errors before you open a pull request.

下一步link

Next stepslink

从本地计算机上的 fork 存储库构建文档并且测试运行没有错误后，你就可以继续了。

After you build the documentation from your forked repo on your local computer and the tests run without error, you are ready to continue.

你已成功配置本地计算机以编辑 Angular 文档并打开 Pull Request。

You have successfully configured your local computer to edit Angular documentation and open pull requests.

继续阅读本节中的其他主题，以获取有关如何执行其他文档任务的信息。

Continue to the other topics in this section for information about how to perform other documentation tasks.

最后复查时间： 10/12/2022
